vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἤτω,
late form for ἔστω, 3rd.pers. singular imperative of εἰμί (sum), [Refs 3rd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: - let him (or it) behim/it be, exist, live
